fields_of_interest: Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Public Health
head_office_address: Knowl Piece Business Centre, Unit 9 6 Knowl Piece, Wilbury Way
eu_initiatives: Involvement with Directives such as ATEX, EMC, LVD, GAD, WEEE, RoHS, and all relevant CENELEC standards and working groups.  Carbon Monoxide Round Table events for MEPs. Pushing for EN 50291 to be listed under the Construction Products Regulations.
organisation_name: Council of Gas Detection and Environmental Monitoring (CoGDEM)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: CoGDEM is a trade association representing manufacturers and other experts in the field of gas detection apparatus.
